about_the_game:
A costume for Rean from his impressionable younger years. Wearing it will (not) unleash the dark power within.
Comes in a set with two accessories.

Unspeakable Costume R x 1
World Rejector x 1
Midnight Heaven x 1

*These items can be obtained from the DLC tab on the Item page. After obtaining the items, they can be equipped from the Costume page on the Camp Menu.
